scripts.db:drop: firebase firestore:delete --project retros-dev-20eb6 -r users && firebase firestore:delete --project retros-dev-20eb6 -r retros && firebase firestore:delete --project retros-dev-20eb6 -r columns && firebase firestore:delete --project retros-dev-20eb6 -r cards
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:seed
